name: BostonGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask Boston Guide to tell me more about boston”
”the top five things to do”
”the latest news”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boston guide
des: Boston Guide helps users learn more about the city of Boston and plan a trip. The skill provides suggestions on top places to see as well as contact and location info for getting around. In addition, the skill allows users to hear the latest news in the city and stay up to date on what is happening in the city.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
